mapper.update: UPDATE tab_user set u_picture = #{path} where u_id = #{u_id}
mapper.insert: insert into tab_edition (versionCode, isUpdate, message, fileUrl, isHotUpdate, hotCode, editionReleasePeople) value (#{versionCode}, #{isUpdate}, #{message}, #{fileUrl}, #{isHotUpdate}, #{hotCode}, #{editionReleasePeople} )
mapper.select: select tet_id,versionCode,isUpdate,message,fileUrl,isHotUpdate,hotCode,editionReleasePeople from tab_edition where tet_id=(select MAX(tet_id) from tab_edition)
